name: Avent Isles (Beta)
description:
Calling all adverturers! 

We need a brave hero to save the citizens of the Avent Isles from the Cave Dwellers and, discover the mystery of Jorium.

Features

  • Customisable Main Character
  • Unlockable Side Charaters - (Full party of 4)
  • Over 90 Levels!
  • Over 40 Sound Tracks!
  • Character Progression
  • Powerful Spells including Super Abilities (Cooldown Feature)
  • Over 100 Items
  • 8 Different Cities/Towns
  • Different Classes / Weapons / Armours

Multiple Platforms

  • Play on Windows, Mac, Linux or Android!
